text: David Geoffrey Penington (4 February 1930 â€“ 6 January 2023) was an Australian medical doctor and academic. He was born in Melbourne, Victoria. He was a graduate of the University of Melbourne and University of Oxford. Penington served as vice-chancellor of the University of Melbourne from 1988 to 1995. Penington died on 6 January 2023, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:Australian academics Category:Australian medical doctors Category:Companions of the Order of Australia Category:People from Melbourne Category:University of Melbourne alumni
title: David Penington
